about_the_game:
Your homeland is dying from drought and disease. You have sailing to several islands in hopes of finding something to save your homeland. You hear rumors of an island that contains a plant that grows deep within the mines. You find the island and an entrance to the miens. Little do you know of the horror that awaits.

Infection Roots Deluxe contains all of the contain found in Infection Roots Plus with all the improvements from Infection Roots HTML Edition. So, you have the bonus contain from plus with wide screen and adjustable camera from HTML. This port also adds screen adjustment, new powerup, and some minor bug fixes

This game only uses Keyboard and Mouse. 

You must find the exit in each level. But you have to be careful as there are infected everywhere, and you have very limited visibility. You can shoot them or slash them with your knife for an instant kill, but your knife has a cooldown that prevents you from shooting. So, use it in emergencies. Thankfully you have health packs to restore some of your life if you get damage. But you have to search for them. You can also supercharge your gun for increase fire rate by picking up ammo crates. These will last until you run out of bullets. Also be on the lookout for keys to unlock doors. You don't want to get stuck. Infected are everywhere and you will have to carefully move around them while aiming am them.

content_descriptors.notes: Zombies are depicted as somewhat gory, basic blood effect when zombies get hit.
